product_name: REI 3 oz. Bottle Set - Package of 3
long_description: The REI Bottle Set makes it simple to travel with liquids and gels, taking the hassle out of packing for those exciting adventures. Store your shampoos, conditioners and lotions in the three 3 oz. plastic containers; includes one interchangeable pump spray top. 3 oz. bottle size complies with current airline restrictions for liquids and gels in your carry-on luggage. Also includes pill organizer, 0.5 oz. acrylic jar and labels for bottles. Zippered mesh pouch secures bottles in 1 place.
short_description: The REI Bottle Set makes it simple to travel with liquids and gels, taking the hassle out of packing for those exciting adventures.
